results.p: Aug 31, 2017 — Uninstall the graphics pack. The game will shrink by over 50 percent. Game play should speed up, and frankly I didn't notice ANY improvement ...

results.t: The era of 100GB games is upon us, and the average ...
results.p: May 12, 2023 — In 2023, six of the ten biggest PC games of the year so far clock in at 90-130GB. It's probably no coincidence that of those six, all but one are huge sandbox ...

results.t: Is the Fallout 4 High Resolution Texture Pack Worth It?
results.p: Apr 25, 2024 — The massive pack weighs nearly 60 GB of precious hard drive space, and the graphical improvements prove minor overall. It doesn't help with performance, either.

results.t: Fallout 4's massive 58 GB hi-res texture pack now available
results.p: Fallout 4's mammoth high-resolution texture pack is now available to download through Steam as a free add-on.

results.t: Fallout 76 Full Download is Almost 100 GB
